title: What if Tryndamere's auto attack doubled in damage with every consecutive blow?
body: So first auto deals 25 damage lets say, then second deals 50, third deals 100, fourth deals 200, fifth deals 400, sixths deals 800, etc to an uncapped amount. The only thing is that he cannot deal critical damage nor can the stacked damage be applied to a new target (so if you stacked 6 autos on enemy you won't be dealing that damage to a new target, but instead start with one stack). Is this a good idea?
